ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminITSMCIPAllocate
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the AdminITSMCIPAllocate configuration in the admin area.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSM::Core::IncidentLinkTypeDirection
ConfigItem.Description: Set the type and direction of links to be used to calculate the incident state. The key is the name of the link type (as defined in LinkObject::Type), and the value is the direction of the IncidentLinkType that should be followed to calculate the incident state. For example if the IncidentLinkType is set to "DependsOn", and the Direction is "Source", only "Depends on" links will be followed (and not the opposite link "Required for") to calculate the incident state. You can add more link types and directions as you like, e.g. "Includes" with the direction "Target". All link types defined in the sysconfig options LinkObject::Type are possible and the direction can be "Source", "Target", or "Both". IMPORTANT: AFTER YOU MAKE CHANGES TO THIS SYSCONFIG OPTION YOU NEED TO RUN THE SCRIPT kix.Console.pl Admin::ITSM::IncidentState::Recalculate SO THAT ALL INCIDENT STATES WILL BE RECALCULATED BASED ON THE NEW SETTINGS!

ConfigItem.Name: ITSM::Frontend::TextArea
ConfigItem.Description: Width of ITSM textareas.

ConfigItem.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###IncidentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the incident states in the preference view.

ConfigItem.Description: Config item event module that shows passed parameters BEFORE action is perdormed. May be used as template for own CI-events.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###999-Test
ConfigItem.Description: Config item event module that shows passed parameters AFTER action is performed. May be used as template for own CI-events.

ConfigItem.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked Services widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only Service attributes are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

ConfigItem.Description: Searches for attributes of type ServiceReference in the new CIs version data and refreshes all links to that class. It deletes links to this class if the value is not existent in the CIs version data.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###502-RefreshTicketReferenceLinks
ConfigItem.Description: Searches for attributes of type CIClassReference in the new CIs version data and refreshes all links to that class. It deletes links to this class if the value is not existent in the CIs version data.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::NumberGenerator
ConfigItem.Description: Selects the configuration item number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the configuration item number, the SystemID, the ConfigItemClassID and the counter are used. The format is "SystemID.ConfigItemClassID.Counter", e.g. 1205000004, 1205000005.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CINameRegex
ConfigItem.Description: Defines regular expressions individually for each ConfigItem class to check the ConfigItem name and to show corresponding error messages.

Hash.Item: A computer name must start with ABC!
A hardware name must end with two digits!

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::DefaultSubObject###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default subobject of the class 'ITSMConfigItem'.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view, depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown.

ConfigItem.Description: Config item event module that enables logging to history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Description: Shows the config item history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::Overview###Small
ConfigItem.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a configuration item list.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Hook
ConfigItem.Description: The identifier for a configuration item, e.g. ConfigItem#, MyConfigItem#. The default is ConfigItem#.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItemSearch screen.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item search. This option has no effect on the position of the column.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item search depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchCSVData
ConfigItem.Description: Data used to export the search result in CSV format.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###SearchLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItem screen.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns in the config item overview. This option has no effect on the position of the column. Note: Class column is always available if filter 'All' is selected.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumnsByClass
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that are common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown as defined in the setting ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ShowColumns.

ConfigItem.Name: UniqueCIName::EnableUniquenessCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Enables/disables the functionality to check ConfigItems for unique names. Before enabling this option you should check your system for already existing config items with duplicate names. You can do this with the script bin/kix.ITSMConfigItemListDuplicates.pl.

ConfigItem.Name: UniqueCIName::UniquenessCheckScope
ConfigItem.Description: Check for a unique name only within the same ConfigItem class ('class') or globally ('global'), which means every existing ConfigItem is taken into account when looking for duplicates.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeature
ConfigItem.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature for the agent frontend to work on more than one configuration item at a time.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeatureGroup
ConfigItem.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature only for the listed groups.

Hash.Item: Shows this object in its relation to other linked CIs

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoomTabLinkGraph###IFrameConfig
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the parameters for the "AgentLinkGraphIFrameDefault".

Hash.Item: This frame should show the current object with its linked objects, depending on your current selection.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoomTabLinkGraph###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item zoom screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoomTabLinkGraph###DefaultMaxLinkDepth
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the preselected maximum search depth for IDDFS (iterative deepening depth-first search) in the object graph.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Agent::AgentLinkGraphITSMConfigItem###LinkColors
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the colors for link visualization - links are just black if no color is given.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Agent::AgentLinkGraphITSMConfigItem###ClassAttributesToConsider
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which class-attribute should be considered for the icons. Sub-attributes are possible. Value must be key not name of attribute!

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Agent::AgentLinkGraphITSMConfigItem###ObjectImages
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the icons for node visualization - key could be a CI-Class (if applicable - e.g. "Computer") or a CI-Class followed by a triple colon and a value of the specified class-attribute (if attribute is "Type" - e.g. "Computer:::Server"). The Icon for a CI-Class is the fallback if no icon for the class-attribute is specified and "Default" is the fallback if no icon for a CI-Class is specified.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Agent::AgentLinkGraphITSMConfigItem###ObjectImagesNotActive
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the icons for node visualization if CIs with a certain deployment state are not shown in CMDB overview (postproductive or configured) - key could be a CI-Class (if applicable - e.g. "Computer") or a CI-Class followed by a triple colon and a value of the specified class-attribute (if attribute is "Type" - e.g. "Computer:::Server"). The Icon for a CI-Class is the fallback if no icon for the class-attribute is specified and "Default" is the fallback if no icon for a CI-Class is specified.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Agent::AgentLinkGraphITSMConfigItem###IncidentStateImages
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the icons for the incident-states - key is the state-type (if applicable - e.g. "operational").

ConfigItem.Name: ConfigItemLinkGraph::HighlightMapping
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a css style element depending on config item deployment state.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the display name for an link graph template. The key is used with the same notation in all following preferences.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the needed permission for an link graph template. Key has to be the same defined in CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###MaxSearchDepth
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the maximum link depth for an link graph template. Key has to be the same defined in CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###RelevantLinkTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the relevant link types for an object graph template. Key has to be the same defined in CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###RelevantObjectSubTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the relevant object sub types for an link graph template. Key has to be the same defined in CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name.

ConfigItem.Name: CIGraphConfigTemplate###AdjustingStrength
ConfigItem.Description: Defines adjusting strength for an link graph template. Key has to be the same defined in CIGraphConfigTemplate###Name.

ConfigItem.Name: ConfigItemLinkGraph::ShowDeploymentStatePostproductive
ConfigItem.Description: Defines whether config items with postproductive deployment state should be shown or not.

ConfigItem.Name: ConfigItemLinkGraph::ExcludedDeploymentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which deployment states should not be shown in config item link graph. Separate different states by comma.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::ShownAttributes
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which attributes are shown in customer table.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerDashboardConfigItemLink::ShownAttributes
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which attributes are shown in customer table.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerDashboardConfigItemLink::CISearchInClasses
ConfigItem.Description: Defines in which CI-classes (keys) which attributes need to match the search pattern (values, comma separated if more than one attribute should be searched). For use with sub-attributes try this, key: attribute::sub-attribute, value: owner

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerDashboardConfigItemLink::CIExcludeDeploymentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defined DeploymentStates to hide ConfigItems.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerDashboardConfigItemLink::CIExcludeIncidentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defined IncidentStates to hide ConfigItems.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::KIXSidebarBackend###LinkedCIs
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the KIXSidebar backend linked config items.

Hash.Item: Shows all config items assigned to selected customers.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###KIXSidebarLinkedCIsAJAXHandler
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the KIXSidebarLinkedCIsAJAXHandler object.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###KIXSidebarLinkedCIsAJAXHandler
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the KIXSidebarLinkedCIsAJAXHandler object.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::KIXSidebarLinkedCIsParams
ConfigItem.Description: Common Parameters for the KIXSidebarLinkedCIs backend. You can use CI class specific contact attributes (SearchAttribute:::<CIClass>) as well as multiple customer user attributes, separated by comma.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::CISearchInClasses
ConfigItem.Description: Defines in which CI-classes (keys) which attributes need to match the search pattern (values, comma separated if more than one attribute should be searched). For use with sub-attributes try this, key: attribute::sub-attribute, value: owner

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::CIExcludeDeploymentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defined DeploymentStates to hide ConfigItems.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::CIExcludeIncidentStates
ConfigItem.Description: Defined IncidentStates to hide ConfigItems.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXSidebarConfigItemLink::LinkType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the link type which is used for the link creation between ticket and config item.

ConfigItem.Name: QuickLink::Backend###ITSMConfigItem
ConfigItem.Description: QuickLink backend registration.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0150-CIC-LinkedCIs
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer assigned config items widget of the agent interface . "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Hash.Item: Shows all config items assigned to selected customers.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###ConfigItem::ConfigItemCreate
ConfigItem.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###ConfigItem::ConfigItemGet
ConfigItem.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###ConfigItem::ConfigItemUpdate
ConfigItem.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###ConfigItem::ConfigItemSearch
ConfigItem.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::Module###ConfigItem::ConfigItemDelete
ConfigItem.Description: GenericInterface module registration for the operation layer.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::ConfigItemGet###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Required permissions to get ITSM configuration items using the Generic Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::ConfigItemSearch###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Required permissions to search ITSM configuration items using the Generic Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::ConfigItemCreate###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Required permissions to create ITSM configuration items using the Generic Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::ConfigItemUpdate###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Required permissions to update ITSM configuration items using the Generic Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: GenericInterface::Operation::ConfigItemDelete###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Defines Required permissions to delete ITSM configuration items using the Generic Interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::GeoCoordinate###InputFormat
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a fallback input format for the form if the format is not set in the config item attribute definition.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::GeoCoordinate###ExportFormat
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a fallback export format for the csv export if the format is not set in the config item attribute definition.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::GeoCoordinate###DisplayFormat
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a fallback display format for the view if the format is not set in the config item attribute definition.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::GeoCoordinate###Link
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a fallback link for the view if the link is not set in the attribute definition of the configuration item. It is possible to use two placeholders to set latitude and longitude. (<LATITUDE>, <LONGITUDE>)
